name: initialize_attendance
attributes: # [doc = " 出席トラッカー初期化：thresholdだけ設定し、残りはデフォルト"]
body: let atd = & mut ctx . accounts . attendance ;
let now = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
* atd = Attendance { bump : * ctx . bumps . get ("attendance") . unwrap () , threshold , last_update_ts : now , .. Default :: default () } ;

name: check_in
attributes: # [doc = " チェックイン：まだクローズしていなければ参加を記録し、閾値到達で自動クローズ"]
body: let atd = & mut ctx . accounts . attendance ;
let now = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
atd . attendees . push (ctx . accounts . user . key ()) ;
if atd . attendees . len () as u8 >= atd . threshold

name: reopen
attributes: # [doc = " 再オープン：閉鎖を解除し、時刻を更新"]
body: let atd = & mut ctx . accounts . attendance ;
atd . last_update_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

fields.name: attendance
fields.attribute: # [account (init_zeroed , payer = authority , seeds = [b"attendance" , authority . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 1 + (4 + 10 * 32) + 1 + 1 + 8)]

fields.name: attendance
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"attendance" , authority . key () . as_ref ()] , bump = attendance . bump ,)]

fields.name: authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " チェックイン／再オープンを行うユーザー（署名必須）"] # [account (signer)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " チェックイン対象のユーザー（キーのみ使用）"]
